title: Please Help! About this Font
content:
"ZUMBAFEST" AND "DANCING FOR A GREEN" ?

You have idea what fonts is this?

Thank you and God bless :)

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052346/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

author: roeljay222

comments.content:
'ZUMBA FEST 2014': [Tally Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052346/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/tally-text) or Filmotype [Alice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052346/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/alice)/ [Candy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052346/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/candy)/ [Brooklyn](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052346/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/brooklyn) should do the job  
'Dancing for a Greener Earth': [Lucida Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052346/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/lucida+handwriting)
